## Supervised Learning in R: Regression
Regression is a task of predicting a numerical outcome (or dependent variable) based on the values of a set of inputs (or independent variables). 

Difference b/w Regression and Classification ?
Regression deals with predicting numeric or continuous variable.
Classification deals with predicting discrete or categorical variable.

Example:
Predicting the number of products you are going to sell is a regression problem.
Will the customer buy the product (yes/no) ? is a classification problem.
What price the customer will pay for our product is a regression problem.
